https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hl4mI28D4NhE6ePNgPojQuyEYw7.jpg A woman who has recently discovered that she is the daughter of Angelo, a major mafia boss, decides to wreak vengeance when he is killed by a hitman. She's aided by his faithful bodyguard, with whom she soon falls in love. Avenging Angelo
